trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException" /> class is an exception thrown when converting data using a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConverter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException" /> 클래스는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConverter" /> 개체를 사용하여 데이터를 변환하는 경우 throw되는 예외입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException" /> class.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException" /> class.
The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException" /> class using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException.#ctor(System.String)" /> 생성자는 지정된 메시지를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The serialized object data about the exception thrown.
trans-unit.target: throw된 예외에 대한 serialize된 개체 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: The contextual data about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 소스 또는 대상에 대한 컨텍스트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException" /> class using the specified serialization data and streaming contextual data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> 생성자는 지정된 serialization 데이터와 스트리밍 컨텍스트 데이터를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed when the exception is thrown.
The <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />, if any, that threw the exception.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException" /> class using the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)" /> 생성자는 지정된 메시지와 내부 예외를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.BerConversionException" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.
